name: Fruit Juice: Happy Match
description:
Fruit Juice: Happy Match is Simple game simply slide the rows or columns to match groups of 3 or more same new fruit to blast.

Features:
- Super delicious and addictive gameplay
- Hundreds of challenging and unique levels
- Different wonderful game-worlds with new designs
- Sweet and powerful boosters helping you solve the quests
- Tasty fruit with interesting and special power-ups
- No Wi-Fi or internet connection required
- Hundreds of best levels to be added regularly for your entertainment
